Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Panarea, Lisca Bianca is connected to the airport, minutes from Port of Panarea, and close to Calcara Beach. This romantic hotel is within close proximity of Panarea Prehistoric Village and Punta del Corvo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a nightclub. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and express check-in. A ferry terminal shuttle is provided at no charge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and bidets.

Located in Panarea, Lisca Bianca is connected to the airport, minutes from Port of Panarea, and close to Calcara Beach. This romantic hotel is within close proximity of Panarea Prehistoric Village and Punta del Corvo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Port of Panarea - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Calcara Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Panarea Prehistoric Village - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Punta del Corvo - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Zimmari Cove - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cala Junco - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Havana Beach - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Cave di Pomice - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Campobianco - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Pilato Mountain - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi
Bianca Beach - 18 km / 11.2 mi
Papesca Beach - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Canneto Beach - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi
Ginostra Port - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi
Quattropani Vecchia Church - 19.4 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Lisca Bianca is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 129.8 km / 80.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Catania Fontanarossa Airport (CTA): Approximate driving time is 1 hour and distance is 100 kilometres (62 miles)

Getting there: There is a bus to Milazzo, where there is a ferry connection to Panarea. A taxi from the airport to Panarea costs about €150. There is also a helicopter service to the island. Price subject to change.

Getting around: The major towns of Sicily, including Messina, Palermo, Catania, Syracuse, and Taormina, are all connected by an efficient and inexpensive rail network. Local bus services operate in most towns and connect the more remote villages. A car would be useful for exploring further afield.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
